about_the_game:
This is Saga of the New Gods.

Our original intention had been to release this game as a series of Book's following the line of the source material, but after discussion, we decided to simply release it as, Saga of the New Gods, Act 1, and so forth. Each act will be released as a DLC to be combined with the existing game.

Act 1 is intended as something of an introduction to the characters and universe of New Earth. Act 1 will be released in an early access format in a few months, followed by Act 2 in a few more months. The complete series is planned, at present, to be released within 2 years.

ABOUT THIS GAME
Story
Blake "The Hammer" Ingersol, is a college baseball prodigy, and avid gamer. He's dating Chelsea, a wild woman who always finds new ways to rock his world.

One evening, as they and their friends are concluding a game, Michelle, gives a ring of wishes to the man she loves, who makes a wish... that will change everything, for everyone, and possibly... end the world.

This game is a fairly faithful, though not entirely faithful, translation of the Book Series by Daniel Black, Saga of the New Gods, set in the universe of New Earth.

This game was developed for you by a husband-and-wife team of game dev's, and we hope you enjoy it.

Gameplay
The game is built on choices that will have an impact on the narrative. Multiple love interests, monstrous, mythological, and human, are available to be pursued, each with their own backstory.

The game contains explicit sexual content including (but not limited to) lesbian, corruption, voyeurism, masturbation, group sex, BDSM, pregnancy, creampies, facials and more.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains Nudity, Sex, Masturbation, Vaginal, Oral, and Lesbian content.

The full game, in addition, contains Anal, Boob jobs, Hand jobs, Foot jobs, Creampie, Facials, Pregnancy, Monster sex, Mythological sex, as well as references to nonconsensual, and rape.

fullgame.name: New Earth Saga of the New Gods

name: New Earth Saga of the New Gods Demo
short_description: This Demo contains a vital series of scenes in the story, where Blake and his friends first begin the journey to become New Gods, or towards complete and total destruction in the new order. Enjoy! And good luck to you.
